result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody Derek Nelson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Habitual Criminality], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant eligible for Substance Abuse Program and eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.  He must complete the Substance Abuse Program before going into the Challenge Incarceration Program.
Concurrent with: Concurrent with 13CF395 & 14CF120

miscConds.notes: Defendant to obtain/maintain employment in an occupation acceptable to his agent.

No consumption or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription in defendant's own name and must take as prescribed.  Defendant must advise agent of any prescriptions he has and get his prescriptions filled only at one pharmacy.

No possession of drug paraphernalia.

May not be present where controlled substances are used or illegally sold.

Not associate with known drug dealers or known drug users.

Obey all no contact orders per agent.

No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.

Complete all assessments ordered by his agent including AODA assessment.

Defendant to pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes:
Pay balance of costs owing.
Not ordered to pay DNA surcharge.
Obtain/maintain full time employment in an occupation approved by agent and not voluntarily quit employment without agent's approval.

Obey all rules and conditions established by the Department of Corrections.

No consumption or possession of alcoholic beverages.  No entering bars, taverns or liquor stores.

No consumption or possession of any controlled substances unless with valid prescription and take exactly as directed to be taken.

No possession of drug paraphernalia.

Not associate with known drug dealers, known drug users or their residences.

Not be present where controlled substances are used or illegally sold.

Obtain housing that meets with agent's approval.

AODA assessment and comply with any treatment and programming recommended.

Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody Derek Nelson
